meanings.definition: Relating to the process of transmigration.
meanings.sent1: The transmigratory nature of the story fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The ancient belief in transmigratory souls influenced many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The transmigratory cat seemed to have nine lives, always coming back unharmed.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like transmigratory spirits, moving from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The artist's transmigratory imagination created fantastical worlds in his paintings.

meanings.definition: Involving the migration of souls from one body to another.
meanings.sent1: The transmigratory process was believed to bring enlightenment to the soul.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of transmigratory beings crossing over to the afterlife.
meanings.sent3: The transmigratory ghost was lost, trying to find its way back to its body.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a transmigratory gaze, as if seeing beyond this world.
meanings.sent5: The transmigratory essence of the music carried listeners to distant memories.
